name: Let's Shop Mom & Pop *Jersey City
description:
Support local business, show your hometown pride AND keep disposable bags out of landfills? This bag does it all!

100% Recycled Cotton Ecobags®: reclaimed post-industrial organic and natural cotton scrap. Ecobags are fair wage/fair labor manufactured.

16" w × 15.5" h; 3" bottom gusset

22" cotton web handles allow you to comfortably carry the bag either over the shoulder or as a tote.

10% of purchases will be donated to Grace Van Vorst's "Breakfast Plus" program in Jersey City. Breakfast Plus provides a hot, nourishing breakfast for the hungry every Saturday and Sunday morning. The program averages about 100 guests each meal.
